name: Shen
title: the Eye of Twilight
lore: Among the secretive, Ionian warriors known as the Kinkou, Shen serves as their leader, the Eye of Twilight. He longs to remain free from the confusion of emotion, prejudice, and ego, and walks the unseen path of dispassionate judgment between the spirit realm and the physical world. Tasked with enforcing the equilibrium between them, Shen wields blades of steel and arcane energy against any who would threaten it.
blurb: Among the secretive, Ionian warriors known as the Kinkou, Shen serves as their leader, the Eye of Twilight. He longs to remain free from the confusion of emotion, prejudice, and ego, and walks the unseen path of dispassionate judgment between the spirit...
allytips: Keep an eye on allies and be ready to save them with your teleport.
Leverage your Energy to get a long-term advantage over Mana users.
enemytips: Be ready to dodge Shen's taunt and punish him if he misses.
Once Shen reaches level 6, watch out for his global-range ultimate, which can turn fights quickly.

riot_spell_q.name: Twilight Assault
riot_spell_q.description: Shen recalls his spirit blade to attack with it, dealing damage based on the target's max health. The attacks are greatly empowered if it collides with an enemy champion, and all collided enemies are slowed while running away from Shen.
riot_spell_q.tooltip:
Shen recalls his spirit blade and draws it. Enemies it collides with are slowed by {{ e4 }}% when moving away from Shen for the next {{ e5 }} seconds.

Shen's next {{ e3 }} attacks deal {{ f1 }} plus {{ e2 }} (+{{ charabilitypower*.01 }})% of their target's max health as bonus magic damage. If the spirit blade collided with an enemy champion, those attacks deal {{ f2 }} plus {{ e6 }} (+{{ charabilitypower2*.01 }})% instead and have +{{ e9 }}% Attack Speed.

Each attack deals {{ e1 }}% increased damage to monsters (capped at {{ e7 }}).

riot_spell_w.name: Spirit's Refuge
riot_spell_w.description: Attacks that would hit Shen or his allies near his spirit blade are blocked.
riot_spell_w.tooltip:
Shen's spirit blade creates a defensive zone for {{ e1 }} seconds. Basic attacks that would hit Shen or an allied champion in the zone are blocked.

If there are no champions to protect in the zone when it starts, the spirit blade will not activate until one enters or {{ e2 }} seconds pass.

riot_spell_e.name: Shadow Dash
riot_spell_e.description: Shen dashes in a direction, taunting enemies in his path.
riot_spell_e.tooltip:
Passive: Dealing damage with Shadow Dash or Twilight Assault recovers {{ f1 }} Energy.

Active: Shen dashes in a direction, dealing {{ e2 }} [+{{ f2 }}] physical damage to enemy champions and neutral monsters in his path and taunting them for {{ e1 }} seconds.

riot_spell_r.name: Stand United
riot_spell_r.description: Shen shields target allied champion from incoming damage, and soon after teleports to their location.
riot_spell_r.tooltip: Shen grants a shield to a target allied champion that lasts {{ shieldduration }} seconds and absorbs up to {{ shield }} to {{ maxshield }} damage based on their missing health. After channeling for {{ channelduration }} seconds, Shen and his spirit blade teleport to the ally's location.

riot_spell_i.name: Ki Barrier
riot_spell_i.description: After casting a spell, Shen gets a shield. Affecting other champions reduces the cooldown of this effect.

wikia_skill_i1.name: Ki Barrier
wikia_skill_i1.blurb: After casting a spell, Shen gets a shield. Affecting other champions reduces the cooldown of this effect.
wikia_skill_i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} After completing an ability's effects, '''Shen''' {{tip|shields}} himself from {{pp18|50|53|56|59|62|65|68|71|74|77|80|83|86|89|92|95|98|101|formula=47 + (3{{times}}level)}} {{as|(+ 14% '''bonus''' health)}} damage for {{fd|2.5}} seconds. If the triggering ability successfully affected at least one champion, ''Ki Barrier's'' {{sti|cooldown}} is reduced by {{pp|8|4|4.5|5|5.5|6|6.5|7|7.5|1|6|9|12|14|16|17|18}} seconds.
wikia_skill_i1.description2: '''Shen's''' power manifests as a {{as|Spirit Blade|buzzword}} that he can control with his abilities.
wikia_skill_i1.notes:
* The {{as|Spirit Blade|buzzword}} spawns with '''Shen''', jumps closer to him if he gets too far away, and [[blink]]s to him if he uses any global blink ({{si|Teleport}}, {{si|Recall}}, {{ai|Abyssal Voyage|Tahm Kench}}, or {{ai|Stand United|Shen}}).
* Enemies see an arrow pointing from '''Shen''' to the location of his {{as|Spirit Blade|buzzword}} even if it is not visible.
* {{ai|Twilight Assault|Shen}} will grant no shield if the {{as|Spirit Blade|buzzword}} is stopped before it reaches '''Shen'''.
* {{ai|Spirit's Refuge|Shen}} will give the shield after the protective zone disappears.
* {{ai|Shadow Dash|Shen}} will give the shield when the dash ends.
** If the dash is {{tip|crowd control|interrupted}}, the shield will instead be received the moment the ''crowd control'' is applied, before damage calculation (if any).

wikia_skill_q1.name: Twilight Assault
wikia_skill_q1.blurb: Shen recalls his spirit blade to attack with it, dealing damage based on the target's max health. The attacks are greatly empowered if it collides with an enemy champion, and all collided enemies are slowed while running away from Shen.
wikia_skill_q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Shen''' recalls his {{as|Spirit Blade|buzzword}} to his location. Enemies the blade collides with are {{tip|slow|slowed}} for the next 2 seconds when moving away from '''Shen'''.
wikia_skill_q1.description2: Once it arrives, '''Shen''' empowers his next 3 [[basic attack]]s within 8 seconds to gain {{sti|range|75 '''bonus''' range}} and deal {{tip|magic damage|{{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}}}.
wikia_skill_q1.leveling2: {{st|Bonus Magic Damage|{{pp|6|10 to 40|1 to 16}} {{as|(+ {{ap|2 to 4}}% {{as|(+ {{fd|1.5}}% per 100 AP)}} of target's '''maximum''' health)|health}}|Total Damage|{{pp|6|10*3 to 40*3|1 to 16}} {{as|(+ {{ap|2*3 to 4*3}}% {{as|(+ {{fd|4.5}}% per 100 AP)}} of target's '''maximum''' health)|health}}}}
wikia_skill_q1.description3: If the {{as|Spirit Blade|buzzword}} collides with an enemy champion, the empowerment is enhanced, dealing increased {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} and gaining {{sti|as|{{as|50% '''bonus''' attack speed}}}}.
wikia_skill_q1.leveling3: {{st|Increased Bonus Damage|{{pp|6|10 to 40|1 to 16}} {{as|(+ {{ap|4 to 6}}% {{as|(+ 2% per 100 AP)}} of target's '''maximum''' health)|health}}|Total Increased Damage|{{pp|6|10*3 to 40*3|1 to 16}} {{as|(+ {{ap|4*3 to 6*3}}% {{as|(+ 6% per 100 AP)}} of target's '''maximum''' health)|health}}}}
wikia_skill_q1.description4: Empowered attacks against {{tip|monsters}} instead deal 100% '''bonus''' damage, but their total damage is capped.
wikia_skill_q1.notes:
* The {{as|Spirit Blade|buzzword}} would stop if colliding with {{ai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}} or {{ai|Unbreakable|Braum}}.
* The magic damage would not be {{ai|Riposte|Fiora|parried}}.

wikia_skill_w1.name: Spirit's Refuge
wikia_skill_w1.blurb: Attacks that would hit Shen or his allies near his spirit blade are blocked.
wikia_skill_w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Shen''' primes his {{as|Spirit Blade|buzzword}}, creating an area around it. If '''Shen''' or an allied champion enter the area, or after 2 seconds, the {{as|Spirit Blade|buzzword}} creates a protective zone around it for {{fd|1.75}} seconds, {{ai|Aegis Protection|Pantheon|icononly=true}} [[On-hit effect#Block|blocking]] all enemy basic attacks in the area.
wikia_skill_w1.notes:
* ''Spirit's Refuge's'' protective zone can be moved while active if '''Shen''' uses {{ai|Twilight Assault|Shen}}.
* ''Spirit's Refuge'' cannot be ranked up at level 1.
* ''Spirit's Refuge'' will also dodge abilities that can trigger [[on-hit effect]]s ({{ai|Parrrley|Gangplank}}, {{ai|Mystic Shot|Ezreal}})

wikia_skill_e1.name: Shadow Dash
wikia_skill_e1.blurb: Shen dashes in a direction, taunting enemies in his path.
wikia_skill_e1.description: {{sbc|Passive:}} Damage from ''Shadow Dash'' and {{ai|Twilight Assault|Shen}} recovers {{sti|energy|{{as|{{pp|3|30 to 40|1;4;12}} energy}}}}.
wikia_skill_e1.description2: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Shen''' {{tip|dashes}} in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemy champions and {{tip|monsters}} he hits and {{tip|taunt|taunting}} them for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
wikia_skill_e1.notes: * Using {{si|Flash}} during the animation of ''Shadow Dash'' will stop the dash, but will taunt and damage enemies in contact with him at the destination.

wikia_skill_r1.name: Stand United
wikia_skill_r1.blurb: Shen shields target allied champion from incoming damage, and soon after teleports to their location.
wikia_skill_r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Shen''' {{ccib|Stand United Minimap.png}}{{ct|noimg=true|channel|channels|attack=false|move=false|consume=false|cast=false|items=false|spells=false}} for 3 seconds, {{tip|Shield|shielding}} the target allied champion for up to 5 seconds, increased by {{as|{{pp|7|type=target's '''missing''' health|key=%|0 to 60|key1=%|0 to 60|formula=1% per 1% of target's '''missing''' health. ''This is capped at 60% '''missing''' health.''}}|health}}.
wikia_skill_r1.leveling: {{st|Minimum Shield|{{ap|175 to 525}} {{as|(+ 135% AP)}}|Maximum Shield|{{ap|175*1.6 to 525*1.6}} {{as|(+ 216% AP)}}}}
wikia_skill_r1.description2: Upon completing the channel, '''Shen''' and his {{as|Spirit Blade|buzzword}} {{tip|blink}} to the target ally's location.
wikia_skill_r1.notes:
* ''Shen'' cannot target himself but can alternatively target allies by clicking their portraits on the right side of the screen or by using the {{sbc|F2 - F5}} keys (none of this can be done if he is affected by {{tip|nearsight}}).
* {{tip|Invisibility|Invisible}} or {{tip|Camouflage|camouflaged}} allies are not revealed by ''Stand United''.
* ''Shen'' will continue channeling and eventually blink so long as ''Stand United's'' target is alive (even if the shield is broken).
** Interrupting ''Stand United's'' channel will not remove the shield prematurely.
